#Text=Aang says : " So you were just gon na take Appa anyway ? "
#Text=Katara says : " Yes . "
#Text=Aang says : " It 's okay , because I forgive you .
#Text=" Aang says : " I was n't planning to .
#Text=This is a journey you need to take .
#Text=You need to face this man .
#Text=But when you do , please do n't choose revenge .
#Text=Let your anger out , and then let it go .
#Text=Forgive him .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Okay , we 'll be sure to do that , guru goody - goody .
#Text=" Katara says : " Thanks for understanding , Aang .
#Text=Yip - yip .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You know , you 're pretty wise for a kid .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Usually it 's annoying , but right now , I 'm impressed .
#Text=" Aang says : " I appreciate that .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , can I borrow Momo for a week ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Why do you need Momo ?
#Text="
